problem_text_cn: 如图,过平行四边形的对称中心0任意画5条直线a、b、m、n、l,已知BC=6,BC边上的高为4,则阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, N_1 straight lines a, b, n, l are drawn arbitrarily across the symmetric center N_0 of the parallelogram. It is known that BC = N_2, and the height on the side of BC is N_3, then the area of ​​the shaded part is ()
